name: Without Hue
description:
Use light and color to reach the goal. Hints are given along the way. * MUST Play in fullscreen*

Without Hue is a super short game made in about 2 days as submission to the minijam with COLORS theme.

Updates?

This game is more or less a prototype so I never planned on making it fully-fledged in the first place. However, if you do want to see this game more developed, comment your suggestions, questions, etc. Feedback is much appreciated. I'll be busy with other gamejams and stuff so I'll only develop it further if people are interested.

(Spoiler Alert Below)

**

**Hints are in the form of a poem.**
